description.value:
Klaive (Fetish Weapon)

Creation Cost: 10 Gnosis

A sacred silvered blade bound with a war spirit. This weapon is magical.

Effect: In addition to the weapon's normal attack and damage bonuses and features (unless the weapon has an intelligence or is already infused with a creature of any type):

  • Deals an additional 1d8 radiant damage to creatures with the Wyrm tag
  • Ignores resistance to slashing damage
  • Once per long rest, on a hit: the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be frightened of you until the end of its next turn
description.chat: Fetish Weapon (Level 4). Magical silvered blade. +1d8 radiant vs Wyrm; ignores slashing resistance; once per long rest on hit: target Con save or frightened until end of its next turn.

activation.condition: When you hit a creature with this weapon

description.chatFlavor: Once per long rest, when you hit with the Klaive: the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier) or be frightened of you until the end of its next turn.
